card.name: Heimdall
card.property: God of Vigilance — Response: After a card you own prevents a minion from entering play, any amount of threat from being placed on a scheme or a friendly character from taking any amount of damage, remove 2 threat from a scheme. (Limit once per phase.)

alternate.name: Heimdall
alternate.property: Sentinel of Asgard — You may include [[asgard]] allies from any aspect in your deck. Action: Search your deck and discard pile for the Hofund upgrade and add it to your hand. (Limit once per round.) “Even Blinded, I can see the truth, Sif..”

card.name: Banishing Blow
card.property: Hero Action (attack): Deal 3 damage to an enemy. Flip The Bifrost to its [[closed]] side. Hero Interrupt: When a minion enters play, exhaust Hofund → discard that minion instead. If an [[elite]] minion was discarded this way, shuffle it into the encounter deck. Flip The Bifrost to its [[closed]] side. "I'll use telepathy to get a census--"

card.name: Cosmic Strike
card.property: Hero Action (attack): Deal 8 damage to an enemy. If The Bifrost is on its [[opened]] side, you may exhaust Hofund → this attack gains overkill and deal 2 damage to each other enemy. "Allfathers. Let the dark magic flow through me one last time." -Heimdall

card.name: "Get Me Out!"
card.property: Hero Interrupt (defense): When a friendly character would take any amount of damage from an attack, exhaust The Bifrost → prevent all of that damage. Flip The Bifrost to its [[opened]] side. If The Bifrost was already on its [[opened]] side, confuse the attacking enemy. "Allfathers. Let the dark magic flow through me one last time." -Heimdall

card.name: Heimdall's Observatory
card.property: While Heimdall is in alter-ego form, he gets +2 REC. Alter-Ego Response: After you change form, exhaust this card → shuffle up to 2 allies from your discard pile into your deck. "You wish to know what I see?" -Heimdall

card.name: All-Hearing
card.property: While Heimdall is in hero form, he gets +1 THW. Hero Interrupt: When any amount of threat would be placed on a scheme (except during step 1 of the villain phase), exhaust this card → prevent 1 of that threat. “I'm okay, guys. I'm still in Colossus's armored form...” —Synch

card.name: All-Seeing
card.property: Hero Action: Exhaust this card → look at the top 1[per_hero] cards of the encounter deck. If you looked at any minion, you may put it into play engaged with you to remove 2 threat from a scheme. “I see WARS, Odinson.” —Heimdall

card.name: Gjallarhorn
card.property: Each of your [[asgard]] allies costs 1 fewer resource to play. Hero Response: After an ally you control defeats a minion or a side scheme, draw 1 card. “The end is come! The horn is sounded!” —Freja

card.name: Guardian of the Rainbow Bridge
card.property: While The Bifrost is on its [[opened]] side, Heimdall gains retaliate 1. While The Bifrost is on its [[closed]] side, Heimdall gains steady. Hero Interrupt: When a minion enters play, exhaust this card → ready Heimdall. “They shall not pass.” —Heimdall

card.name: Hofund
card.property: While The Bifrost is on its [[opened]] side and Heimdall is in hero form, he gets +1 ATK. Hero Action: Exhaust this card and spend 1 resource of any type → flip The Bifrost. “I can always hear its call.” —Heimdall

card.name: Shared Vision
card.property: Attach to a friendly character. Temporary. Attached character gets +2 THW. Interrupt: When the attached ally would take any amount of consequential damage, discard this card → prevent 1 of that damage. “See through NEW EYES." -Jane Foster

card.name: The Bifrost
card.property: Permanent. Setup. Interrupt: When a minion would be revealed from a non-set aside area, give it to the villain as a facedown boost card instead (shuffle it into the encounter deck instead if it was an [[elite]] minion). Then, flip this card.

alternate.name: The Bifrost
alternate.property: Permanent. The first minion revealed each round gains quickstrike. Hero Action: Exhaust this card → search your deck for an [[asgard]] ally (any ally instead if you also exhaust Hofund) and add it to your hand.

card.name: Overloaded Senses
card.property: Treat the printed text box of your identity and each of your [[superpower]] upgrades as if they were blank (except for [[traits]]). Alter-Ego Action: Exhaust Heimdall → remove Overloaded Senses from the game.

card.name: Judgement of All Gods
card.property: Mangog was unleashed once again and raged that he would bring about the ultimate judgment upon the Asgardians. Supports cannot ready. The Bifrost cannot be flipped to its [[closed]] side. When Revealed: Exhaust each support. Flip The Bifrost to its [[opened]] side. [amplify]

card.name: Mangog
card.property: Mangog entering play cannot be canceled. Triggered ability on The Bifrost cannot be resolved. [star]Mangog gets +1 ATK for each [[asgard]] character you control. (Heimdall's nemesis minion.) "Time for Gods to die screaming and wailing!"

card.name: Kingdom In Ruin
card.property: When Revealed: Choose to either discard a support you control or take 1+X indirect damage, where X is equal to the printed cost of the support you control with the highest cost. Otherwise, this card gains surge. [star]Boost: Deal 2 damage to an ally you control.

card.name: Unquenchable Rage
card.property: When Revealed: Find the Mangog minion and put him into play engaged with you. Then, Mangog attacks an ally you control (attacks you with +1 ATK instead if you do not control any ally). [star] Boost: Mangog attacks you after this activation.
